history_event.text: It earned its name when it kept a lone sentinel standing at {place} through {event}.
It changed hands after a betrayal in {place}; the original owner was never found, only their footprints.
It was briefly displayed in a fey court, where every compliment was a contract.
It survived a shipwreck near {place}, washing ashore with a map no one remembers drawing.
It was recovered after a fire in the halls of {faction}, still warm to the touch days later.
It was traded to settle a debt with the dead beneath {place}. The price was paid, but never itemized.
